item.description:
Weather Looks to be a Beautiful Evening. Please see below, updated information from The Mill on the River.

We will be in the Rafters Room. Check with the Hostess upon coming in.

Comes complete with our own private bar in this room and a Outdoor balcony!!!!!!!! How special our group is.........






May 7 2009 THURSDAY

Mill On the River.

One Low Price. See below.

$18. 00 (Such a Deal !!)

HAPPY HOUR TIME FOR SINGLES

Happy Hour Prices from 5-7PM. Our area open till 9:00P

With THE IRA!!!


UPDATED NEWS BELOW

The last Happy Hour was a tremendous success. We had over 50 Singles enjoying themselves with food, beverages, and Mingling at it’s very best…..

See all the Singles having fun at: http://www.meetup.com...


AND MORE NEWS:

A. We now have a Exclusive Area downstairs, which will include a Private Patio with dramatic Water view. Linen Table Cloths with Scented candles.

B. Our own knowledgeable Bar Staff and Attentive Wait Staff.

One Low Price for All. It is just- $ 18.00. (Same cost if you do not have a mixed drink- If you do not drink, just sell your drink ticket to someone who wants more than 2 drinks)



C. The cold hors d’oeuvres, such as cheese and crackers and antipasto, will be set-up buffet style. Our chef will select some hot hors d’oeuvres that will be butler-passed from 5:00 – 7:00.
We will provide each guest with two drink tickets that will be available for complimentary Happy Hour Drinks from 5:00 – 7:00. After this time the bar will change to cash & carry.

Don’t miss out on the fun, AND entertainment of Ira!!!!!

Let’s Break the Ice….

A New Tradition: The Meet and Greet Single Line. A 30 Second Introduction!!! Starts at 6:00PM…… Don’t miss out on this wonderful way to meet people!!!!!!



Filled with fun, stimulating conversation, meeting new folks, and enjoying the Happy Hour Food and Drink Specials. Celebrate Every Thursday of the week and maybe meet your “Special Person”.

Where: The Mill on the River, 989 Ellington Road, South Windsor, CT.

Downstairs, Our own Exclusive Area

Please- RSVP No Later than May 7 at 9:00AM, so the restaurant can determine how much delicious food to prepare.

Ira Wettenstein- 860-604-5792- mistrchrming@aol.com
item.how_to_find_us: Downstairs, Our Own Private Area .Hostess will greet you.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Happy Hour with The Ira. The Party Continues
